sentences.en: Now, across the windswept plains of the Sahel, carcasses of cattle litter the landscape.
sentences.cn: 现在, 全国各地,微风吹拂中原的萨赫勒地区, 屠体的黄牛随处可见的景观.

sentences.en: Rain - washed and windswept , sumac brightens as it nears peak season.
sentences.cn: 每当临近漆树的生长旺季,其树叶在经历了风吹雨打之后色彩显得更为明亮.

sentences.en: The surrounding countryside is windswept and rocky.
sentences.cn: 这周围的乡村风多石头多。

sentences.en: The wild is more than just an expanse of tangled forests, stagnant swamps and windswept plains.
sentences.cn: 荒野不仅仅是宽广纠结的森林 、 停滞淤塞的沼泽和暴风肆虐的平原.
受大风侵袭的大西洋海岸

sentences.en: This valley is not windswept; it is a sheltered place.
sentences.cn: 这个山谷并不多风, 却很平静.

sentences.en: We stand on a lonely, windswept point on the northern shore of France.
sentences.cn: 我们站在法国北部海岸孤零零迎风而立的顶端.

trans.tran_cn: 风刮的，被风吹扫的，暴露在风中的
trans.tran_en: a place that is windswept is often windy because there are not many trees or buildings to protect it
